resources.string: by Carlos Rafael Gimenes das Neves
Simple and straightforward Android music player, with equalizer

Looking for more info?
Maybe the source code?
Have a request?
Found a bug?!?
Just want to contact me? :)

Drop me an e-mail:
dev@carlosrafaelgn.com.br
or visit the application's project site on GitHub:
https://github.com/carlosrafaelgn/FPlayAndroid

Free third-party resources used in the application:

The font used to draw the scalable icons, icons.ttf, was created using IcoMoon App, by Keyamoon, available at:
http://icomoon.io/app

Some of the scalable icons were created by me and some came from the IcoMoon Free icon set, by Keyamoon, licensed under the Creative Commons License 3.0.

Do you really want to overwrite the %1$s \"%2$s\"?
Do you really want to delete the %1$s \"%2$s\"?
This button adds to the playlist all songs in the folder and in its subfolders.
This button adds to the playlist all songs in the folder and in its subfolders, and starts the playback.
It was not possible to access the download folder :(
Something went wrong while exporting the settings :(
Automatically turn off the player after:
Show divider between items in lists
Use large spacing between items in lists
Prevent the Back key from returning to the home screen
Use two clicks/touches to play songs in the playlist
Spin current song\'s title when it does not fit on the screen
Preload next song in order to try to reduce the gap between consecutive songs
Clear existing list before playing a folder, a new list or an album

Volume fade in\'s duration when unpausing:
Volume fade in\'s duration when starting new songs after silence:

Your device does not support equalizer :(
Your device does not support bass boost :(
Your device does not support fine bass boost adjustment :(
Sorry, but something went wrong during the playback :(
Sorry, but something went wrong during the playback:
Sorry, but the playback had to be stopped because the player has misbehaved :(
Sorry, but a data access problem has happened during the playback :(
Sorry, but the file could not be found :(
Sorry, but the time to access song data has expired during the playback :(
Sorry, but the media server suddenly died during the playback :(
Sorry, but a security problem has happened during the playback :(
